sqlMap.insert: insert into ga_user_behavior_record ( id, buttonPosition, ip, sessionId, productId, extField, pageTypeId, pageValue, endUserId, clientType, clientTime, newUserFlag, userurgent ) values (#id#,#buttonPosition#,#ip#,#sessionId#,#productId#,#extField#,#pageTypeId#, #pageValue#,#endUserId#,#clientType#,#clientTime#,#newUserFlag#,#userurgent#)
